GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.25 to before v5.15.79
GSD.description:
capabilities: fix undefined behavior in bit shift for CAP_TO_MASK

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.79 by commit 151dc8087b5609e53b069c068e3f3ee100efa586, it was introduced in version v2.6.25 by commit e338d263a76af78fe8f38a72131188b58fceb591. For more details please see the references link.
